docs.title: Commands
docs.text:
• mkdocs new [dir-name] - Create a new project.
  • mkdocs serve - Start the live-reloading docs server.
  • mkdocs build - Build the documentation site.
  • mkdocs -h - Print help message and exit.

docs.title: Project layout
docs.text:
mkdocs.yml    # The configuration file.
docs/
    index.md  # The documentation homepage.
    ...       # Other markdown pages, images and other files.
print("hello world")

docs.title: Print statment
docs.text:
ใช้คำสั่ง print แสดงข้อความ Hello world

print("hello ")

docs.title: Variables and Types
docs.text:
อธิบายเรื่อง primitive type · Integer · Float · Boolean · String

# Integer a = 5 print(type(a)) # Float b = 10.11 print(type(b)) # Boolean d = True print(type(d)) print(isinstance(d, bool)) Just press 'Run'.

docs.title: Condition
docs.text:
if

if else

if elif else

** มีตั้งแต่ python 3.10 switch case

docs.title: Exception handling
docs.text:
try except

try except Error1 except Error2

try except finally

docs.title: Functions
docs.text:
def sum_two_numbers(a, b): return a + b

def sum_two_numbers(a: int, b: int) -> int: return a + b

docs.title: Loops
docs.text:
while

continue

break

for num in range(1,6): print(num)

list_of_data = [1,2,4,5] for data in list_of_data: print(data)

for index, data in enumerate(list_of_data): print(index) print(data)

sample_data = {} for key, value in sample_data.itemes()
